org.sakaiproject.user.impl

Class DbPreferencesService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.user.impl.BasePreferencesService
      • org.sakaiproject.user.impl.DbPreferencesService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.sakaiproject.entity.api.EntityProducer, org.sakaiproject.user.api.PreferencesService, org.sakaiproject.util.StorageUser

    public abstract class DbPreferencesService
extends BasePreferencesService

    DbPreferencesService is an extension of the BasePreferencesService with database storage.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  DbPreferencesService.DbStorage
      Covers for the BaseXmlFileStorage, providing Preferences and PreferencesEdit parameters

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean m_autoDdl
      Configuration: to run the ddl on init or not.
      protected boolean m_locksInDb
      If true, we do our locks in the remote database, otherwise we do them here.
      protected String m_tableName
      Table name for realms.
